dcterms:creator: H. Wang
S. Sridhar
J. Huang
J. Valentin
S. Song
L. J. Guibas
dcterms:description: The CAMERA dataset is generated by rendering and composing synthetic objects into real scenes in a context-aware manner. It contains 300K composite images, with 25K set aside for evaluation, and includes 1085 object instances selected from 6 different categories.
dcterms:title: CAMERA

dcterms:creator: H. Wang
S. Sridhar
J. Huang
J. Valentin
S. Song
L. J. Guibas
dcterms:description: The REAL dataset captures 4300 real-world images of 7 scenes for training, and 2750 real-world images of 6 scenes for evaluation. Each set contains 18 real objects spanning 6 categories.
dcterms:title: REAL
